title: Malala Yousafzai urges countries to open borders to Afghan refugees as Taliban take over
content:
1. Malala Yousafzai urges countries to open borders to Afghan refugees as Taliban take over  CBS News
  2. Malala Yousafzai breaks silence on Taliban, calls for 'immediate cease-fire'  New York Post
  3. Nobel Peace Prize laureate Malala Yousafzai calls for the international community to help Afghan women  Business Insider
  4. Malala warns women, minorities in jeopardy as Taliban takes Kabul | ABC7  ABC7
  5. Malala Yousafzai urges world leaders to take urgent action on Afghanistan  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
